sdg-VC_SNS_WALN_DRK-MALE.def: Adult U.S. residents who answer "yes" to the following: Is there any area near where you live - that is,within a mile - where you would be afraid to walk alone at night?
sdg-VC_SNS_WALN_DRK-MALE.name: Proportion of population that feel safe walking alone around the area they live after dark (%)
